reviewText: I made it when other black filmmakers weren't even thinking about making action films.

Really great to have this movie on dvd finally.  There are a lot of cool bonus features and stuff as well.

The major problem is that the movie is stretched to widescreen.  That is bad enough but would be fixable by changing your tv settings if not for the fact that it is non-anamorphic as well.  so you can change the settings to 4x3 and watch it in the proper aspect ratio but it is in a pretty tiny box in the middle of the screen.

I really hope they they can fix this issue because it makes it hard to watch.
